customerNumber.description: Unique number assigned to the customer

createdAt.description: Date and time when the customer was created

createdBy.description: Identifier of the user who created the customer

lastModifiedAt.description: Date and time when the customer was last modified

lastModifiedBy.description: Identifier of the user who last modified the customer

stores.description: List of stores associated with the customer

title.description: Title (e.g., Mr., Mrs., Dr.) associated with the customer

salutation.description: Salutation used for addressing the customer

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the customer

companyName.description: Name of the company associated with the customer

vatId.description: VAT identification number of the customer

addresses.description: List of addresses associated with the customer

defaultShippingAddressId.description: ID of the default shipping address for the customer

defaultBillingAddressId.description: ID of the default billing address for the customer

isEmailVerified.description: Indicates if the customer's email address has been verified

externalId.description: External identifier associated with the customer

customerGroup.description: Customer group to which the customer belongs

custom.description: Custom data associated with the customer

authenticationMode.description: The mode of authentication for the customer

lastMessageSequenceNumber.description: Sequence number of the last message related to the customer

versionModifiedAt.description: Date and time when the customer's version was last modified
